txt.en: Gristlefell and Mithrin láthbears can be found in Ered Mithrin.\n\nYou should defeat láthbears.
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Gristlefell, a ravenous wild beast in Ered Mithrin.
You have defeated Gristlefell and assisted the expedition.

The bounty notice reads:

'Who among you has not known the fear of a bear's call in the woods? It is a warning to keep away, a distant threat. But it is different here in the Ered Mithrin. Here, the láthbear will give you little notice of its ire; before you know you are hunted, it is upon you, its red eyes full of hate, its sharp teeth slavering!

'Of all the láthbears that prowl these mountains, none is more dangerous than the one named Gristlefell. A reward to any who can bring him down, along with others of his sloth!'
